description:
Stand guard over your enterprise's mobile perimeter with MobileIron Sentry.

Smartphones and tablets are streaming into the enterprise, coming in the front door and, with far more frequency than IT is aware, flooding in the back door, as well. You must protect your most important and exposed corporate asset: email.

But, how do you get your arms around this massive mobile surge and its security impact to your enterprise? You need to get the right information, in the right hands, at the right time – on a platform that’s both mobile and a cinch to use: the TouchPad. 

MobileIron's Sentry gives your IT guys the visibility and control to stand guard over your mobile perimeter.  With a simple, elegant interface that's been built from the ground up to full make use of the TouchPad's form factor, multitouch interface, and elegant gesture capabilities, IT can now secure their mobile enterprise while on the go.

Monitor:
Quickly see every single device that’s connected to your ActiveSync email system.
View threats by date and threat profile.

Identify:
Track devices and users that may compromise your security perimeter the most.
See the new devices that have connected most recently.
Trend your enterprise device connectivity by mobile operating system.

Enforce:
Block offending devices or users from accessing email.
Allow device access by overriding automated policy or posture rules.
Register devices to bring them into the enterprise fold.
Wipe stolen, lost, or compromised devices.


NOTE: The app includes a demo mode that will make it easy for anyone to preview MobileIron Sentry functionality. For full enterprise functionality, the MobileIron Sentry requires MobileIron’s Virtual Smartphone Platform.
